channel.title: Birthday gift ideas?
channel.description:
So my 82 year old aunt's birthday is like on April Fools day. I need a GOOD gift idea. I can't seem to find anything that is "caring" but also "April foolish" all at the same time. Any ideas?
If I can't think of anything by the 31[sup]st[/sup] after I celebrate Easter will run out to a store and just buy a throw blanket but I know she has too many of those as it is.
[hr]
Also, my younger sister will be having a birthday (she will be 19) and taking ideas for that as well. Ironically her birthday is on Tax day -.-

item.title: Birthday gift ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

The clocks on that website are really nice.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday gift ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

lilly001:

hmmm what she likes doing? Maybe something handmade?

She’s too lazy to make handmade items anymore. Hell, she used to make hand rolled biscuits but now she uses the stuff out of the can. Sadly, I don’t have the time to make something homemade either

lilly001:

How much money u want to spend ?

I get paid Friday so not an issue really.

lilly001:

I like the handmade things from cuckoo-palace.com/ or some other things ? Maybe something like this ?

Will check out the site thanks

Edit: little too rich for my blood sorry o_0…was thinking more like $500 -

Read full topic

[hr]

Also, my younger sister will be having a birthday (she will be 19) and taking ideas for that as well. Ironically her birthday is on Tax day -.-[/quote]

hmmm what she likes doing? Maybe something handmade?
How much money u want to spend ?
I like the handmade things from cuckoo-palace.com/ or some other things ? Maybe something like this ?

How about photoshop a fake certificate that you purchased a a coffin for her, and add a fake picture of the coffin on it.
[/quote]That’s loveed up[/quote]
And I quote:

Cruel Truth
Yeah.

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday gift ideas?
item.dc:creator: @l11 l
item.description:
@l11 wrote:

Just give her 2 gifts

  1. A knitting set
  2. Probably something good, like a necklace or gown or w.e

First give her the knitting set and see how she reacts
Then give her the second .

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:14, topic:510282”]Old people love photo’s (memory’s) why not get a digital photo frame?[/quote]actually a good idea. Maybe I could get a picture on there of me and have it say on the picture, something like “now you will never be alone” or “now you have somebody to talk to!”

item.title: Birthday gift ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:11, topic:510282”]Just be like happy birthday, LOL april fools you old hag! < [size=24pt]I’m joking![/size]

Just have a small house party with your family and buy a knitting set or a jumper or something :)?[/quote]^ bought her a knitting kit last year actually…yeah…she hasn’t touched it yet once xD

Come to find out she’s old as hell but doesn’t know a single thing about sewing heh

Read full topic

item.title: Birthday gift ideas?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Just be like happy birthday, LOL april fools you old hag! < [size=24pt]I’m joking![/size]

Just have a small house party with your family and buy a knitting set or a jumper or something :)?
